translations.target: Sheet1
The Wuji Sacred Emperor
Male-oriented

translations.source: 昆仑派掌门升天前留下遗嘱，托付弟子守护大夏龙脉。掌门之位为无极圣皇，拥有特殊权力。掌门弟子遭遇南苑郡主强行带走，原是师尊指腹为婚的妻子。郡主带来结婚协议和国宝紫罗丹，欲与掌门弟子成婚。双方因误会和傲慢产生冲突。掌门弟子接到家书，得知父亲重病需回家。途中遇到武林盟主女儿的比武招亲大会，其妹小慈被迫参加。比武中，各路英雄挑战，赵臣宗师突破挑战极限，最终战胜扶桑人，赢得比武招亲。
translations.target: Before ascending, the head of the Kunlun Sect left a will entrusting his disciple with safeguarding the Great Xia dragon vein. The position of sect master is the Wuji Sacred Emperor, vested with special authority. The disciple is forcibly taken away by the Princess of Nanyuan—his betrothed bride from a childhood arrangement made by his master. The princess brings a marriage agreement and the national treasure, the Ziluo Elixir, intending to marry him. Misunderstandings and arrogance spark conflict between the two. The disciple then receives a letter from home and learns that his father is gravely ill and he must return. On the way, he encounters a martial arts tournament held by the Alliance Leader's daughter to choose a husband; his younger sister, Xiao Ci, is forced to compete. Heroes from all quarters issue challenges. Grandmaster Zhao Chen pushes past the limits, ultimately defeating a warrior from Fusang and winning the spouse-selection tournament.
Mom, Love Me Once More
Female-oriented

translations.source: 苏桐生来体弱得了脑瘤，压迫神经导致失明，恶父不救治反将其卖给人贩子，其母许温淑几度寻子，十八年后命运使得母女二人再次相见，可迎接她们的仍是各种艰难险阻
translations.target: Su Tong is born frail and develops a brain tumor that compresses her nerves and leaves her blind. Her vicious father refuses to treat her and instead sells her to human traffickers. Her mother, Xu Wenshu, searches for her time and again. Eighteen years later, fate reunites mother and daughter—only for them to face yet more hardships and obstacles.

translations.source: 被遗忘的星星（消逝的星光）
translations.target: The Forgotten Star (Fading Starlight)
Female-oriented

translations.source: 黎雪发现女儿诺诺被独自留在熄火的车内，生命垂危，而丈夫刘斌却正与情人素素及其子亮亮游玩，拒接电话甚至误导救援。婆婆冷漠，希望孙女出事好让黎雪再孕产子。黎雪焦急寻女，屡遭挫折，甚至误砸他人车，情绪崩溃，这时助理林川传来了找到刘斌车子的消息……
translations.target: Li Xue discovers that her daughter, Nuo Nuo, has been left alone in a car with the engine off and is in critical danger. Meanwhile, her husband Liu Bin is out having fun with his mistress Su Su and her son Liang Liang—refusing to answer calls and even misleading rescuers. Her mother-in-law is cold and indifferent, hoping something happens to the granddaughter so Li Xue will conceive again. Desperate to find her child, Li Xue suffers setback after setback, even smashing someone else's car by mistake, and breaks down emotionally—until her assistant Lin Chuan brings news that Liu Bin's car has been located...
Mr. Fu: Addicted to Cruel Love (A Wrong Love, Hard to Untangle)
Female-oriented

translations.source: 两年后，顾清雨被冤枉找人玷污傅廷也未婚妻一事出狱，被傅廷也强行带走，本想找两个混混为自己报仇，可于心不忍在中途叫停，并和沈遇喝酒时被他下药，阴差阳错与顾清雨发生了关系，为了报仇让顾家破产清算，恰在此时顾老重病住院，不得已去求傅廷也借钱，而傅廷也为了吸引舒梦出现答应了，借此与顾清雨假结婚发生了一系列相爱相杀的事情
translations.target: Two years later, Gu Qingyu is released from prison after being framed for hiring someone to defile Fu Tingye's fiancée. Fu Tingye forcibly takes her away. She originally plans to hire two thugs to get revenge, but cannot bring herself to go through with it and calls it off midway. Later, while drinking with Shen Yu, she is drugged by him; by a twist of fate, he ends up sleeping with her. Seeking revenge, Fu Tingye drives the Gu family into bankruptcy and liquidation. At the same time, Old Master Gu falls critically ill and is hospitalized, leaving Gu Qingyu with no choice but to beg Fu Tingye for money. Fu Tingye agrees—using it as bait to lure Shu Meng to reappear—and the two enter a sham marriage, setting off a series of love-and-hate entanglements.

translations.source: 女总裁的复仇（复仇女神）
translations.target: The Female CEO's Revenge (Goddess of Revenge)
Female-oriented

translations.source: 女主姜婉兮回国后得知姐姐死讯，为了调查姐姐死因，选择封锁消息并且假扮姐姐身份回到婆家查找线索。扮演姐姐身份后，才发现这一家子对姐姐竟是非人待遇，女主决定在查找真凶之时也要严惩这群恶人
translations.target: After returning to China, the heroine Jiang Wanxi learns of her sister's death. To investigate the cause, she chooses to keep the news sealed and impersonates her sister as she returns to the in-laws' home to search for clues. Once she assumes her sister's identity, she discovers the family treated her sister inhumanely. Jiang Wanxi resolves to punish these villains severely even as she hunts down the true culprit.

translations.source: 《回到古代当昏君》（穿越求死路）
translations.target: Back to Ancient Times as a Foolish Ruler (Transmigration: A Path to Seek Death)
Male-oriented

translations.source: 荣宇是勤勤恳恳想要通过做好事成仙的人，穿越到大燕昏君的身上后知道求死也能成仙，便开启了艰难的“求死”之路，在这一路爱上了刺杀他的女主舒亦君，并给昏君的口碑带来了惊人的逆转，成为远近闻名、十里八乡人人夸的一代明君。
translations.target: Rong Yu is a diligent man who hopes to attain immortality by doing good deeds. After transmigrating into the body of the foolish ruler of Dayan, he learns that seeking death can also lead to immortality, and thus begins a grueling "path to death." Along the way, he falls in love with the heroine Shu Yijun, who was sent to assassinate him, and he brings about an astonishing reversal of the tyrant's reputation—becoming a celebrated wise ruler praised far and wide.
Qingqiu Locked in the Cold Palace
Female-oriented

translations.source: 在大成皇朝，王皇子盛明轩登基，丞相之女文清秋功不可没，本将册封为后。然而，表妹宁媚儿指控文清秋谋害宁妃，并出示证据，导致文丞相一家被囚，文清秋亦身陷囹圄。面对重重困境，文清秋誓要揭开真相，为家人洗清冤屈。她不仅要面对皇权与阴谋的较量，还要探寻皇室深处的秘密。这是一部充满智慧、勇气与爱情的宫廷大戏，文清秋的命运将如何演变，敬请期待。
translations.target: In the Dacheng Dynasty, Prince Sheng Mingxuan ascends the throne. The prime minister's daughter, Wen Qingqiu, has rendered outstanding service and is about to be crowned empress. However, her cousin Ning Meier accuses Wen Qingqiu of murdering Consort Ning and presents purported evidence, resulting in the imprisonment of the Wen family and Wen Qingqiu herself. Faced with layers of adversity, Wen Qingqiu vows to uncover the truth and clear her family's name. She must not only contend with imperial power and court intrigue, but also probe secrets buried deep within the royal household. This is a palace drama filled with wit, courage, and love—how will Wen Qingqiu's fate unfold? Stay tuned.

translations.source: 渣男前夫为何跪地求饶
translations.target: Why Is My Scumbag Ex-Husband Kneeling and Begging for Mercy?
Female-oriented

translations.source: 林氏集团老丈人去世，女儿期待女婿出席葬礼，却迟迟未见身影。传言女婿陆长江不参加葬礼，反而去机场接一名女子，引发外界对其不忠的猜测。女儿面对记者的追问，坚定表示信任丈夫，认为他不是这样的人。然而，随着更多证据浮现，女儿与丈夫间的信任出现裂痕。在葬礼现场，女儿情绪激动，质问丈夫为何不参加父亲的葬礼，反而去接别的女人。丈夫试图解释，但未能平息妻子的怒火。妻子决心亲自追问丈夫真相，若他真的背叛了自己，便坚决离婚。同时，围绕丈夫的行为，家庭内部矛盾升级，外界的猜测与质疑也未曾停歇。
translations.target: The Lin Group patriarch—her father—passes away. The daughter expects her husband to attend the funeral, but he never shows up. Rumors spread that her husband, Lu Changjiang, skipped the funeral to pick up a woman at the airport, fueling suspicions of infidelity. Under reporters' questioning, the daughter firmly insists she trusts her husband and believes he would never do such a thing. Yet as more evidence emerges, cracks form in their trust. At the funeral, she becomes emotional and confronts him: why did he miss her father's funeral only to go meet another woman? He tries to explain, but cannot quell her anger. Determined to get the truth, she decides to confront him personally—and if he truly betrayed her, she will divorce without hesitation. Meanwhile, the family's internal conflicts intensify, and public speculation and scrutiny do not relent.

translations.source: 风流小神医和四个绝色师姐
translations.target: The Flirtatious Miracle Doctor and His Four Stunning Senior Sisters
Male-oriented

translations.source: 神医殿被蛊王攻陷，老殿主失踪，新任殿主叶凡也因重伤失忆流落民间，却又遭未婚妻孔雪背叛跌落高楼，多重刺激下叶凡恢复记忆，但因旧日伤未愈，武力值不足，处处被蛊王势力掣肘。叶凡为了找寻老殿主下落和治疗伤势，带着一纸婚约找上上官家，想借助纯阴之体疗伤，却屡陷阴谋，遭遇迫害
translations.target: The Divine Healer Hall is overrun by the Gu King. The former hall master vanishes, and the newly appointed hall master Ye Fan suffers severe injuries, loses his memory, and ends up drifting among commoners. He is then betrayed by his fiancée Kong Xue and falls from a high-rise. Under the shock of repeated blows, Ye Fan regains his memories—but his old injuries have not healed, leaving him short on strength and constantly constrained by the Gu King's forces. To find the missing former hall master and cure his injuries, Ye Fan takes a marriage contract to the Shangguan family, hoping to use a Pure Yin constitution to heal himself, only to be repeatedly ensnared in conspiracies and persecuted.

translations.source: 总裁你的闺女被虐惨了（总裁千金劫）
translations.target: CEO, Your Daughter Has Been Abused Horribly (The CEO Heiress' Ordeal)
Female-oriented

translations.source: 江家男子向妻子索要钱财，仅得到十元后不满地咒骂，表示需要三万块钱并声称会再想办法。妻子劝他别再赌博，却遭到丈夫的怒斥和指责，称是家中的女儿导致了江家家底亏空。此时，伟哥到访，江家男子慌忙迎接，伟哥提及他欠下的三万块钱债务，江家男子请求宽限两天，但被伟哥拒绝。伟哥注意到江家男子的妻子貌美，提出不当建议，江家男子竟默许。随后，伟哥又盯上了他们年幼且长相水灵的女儿，提出让女儿抵债，江家男子犹豫后竟表示听从。女儿惊恐呼救，场面危急。此时，有人称呼乔总好，家政人员也打招呼，另一女子得到小兵的消息，表现出惊喜。
translations.target: A man from the Jiang family demands money from his wife. When he gets only ten yuan, he curses in frustration, saying he needs 30,000 yuan and will find a way. His wife urges him to stop gambling, but he shouts back and blames their daughter for draining the family's savings. At that moment, Brother Wei arrives. The man rushes to greet him. Brother Wei brings up the 30,000-yuan debt, and although the man begs for two more days, Brother Wei refuses. Noticing the wife's beauty, Brother Wei makes an indecent suggestion—and the husband tacitly allows it. Brother Wei then sets his sights on their young, pretty daughter, proposing she be used to repay the debt. After hesitating, the husband agrees. The daughter cries out in terror as the situation turns perilous. Just then, someone greets "President Qiao," the housekeeping staff also say hello, and another woman receives news from Xiao Bing and reacts with delight.

translations.source: 《带娃离婚后，首富千金瞒不住了》
translations.target: After Divorcing with a Child, the Billionaire Heiress Can No Longer Hide
Female-oriented

translations.source: 选择离婚带着孩子离开。离婚后，由于某些机缘巧合，她首富千金的身份不再能隐瞒，随之而来的是一系列的变化，比如她可能利用家族的财富和资源开始新的生活，让曾经看不起她的人刮目相看，同时也可能面临着一些新的挑战和情感纠葛。
translations.target: She chooses to divorce and leave with her child. After the divorce, due to a series of coincidences, her identity as a billionaire heiress can no longer be concealed. A chain of changes follows: she may use her family's wealth and resources to start a new life and make those who once looked down on her see her in a new light, while also facing new challenges and emotional entanglements.
The Big Boss' Wife of the Possessive Young Master Wen
Female-oriented

translations.source: 她美丽纤弱，他派无数暗卫保护，却发现众暗卫接不过她一招~
translations.target: She looks beautiful and delicate. He assigns countless hidden guards to protect her—only to discover that none of them can withstand a single move from her.

translations.source: 《满级甜诱!在傅爷怀里声色撩人》
translations.target: Max-Level Sweet Temptation! Teasing in Master Fu's Arms
Female-oriented

translations.source: 女明星姜予漾爱慕V神已久，做梦都是V神，而现实中的从未谋面的未婚夫傅以泽，因为爷爷辈的恩情，要求姜予漾跟傅家结姻，可是傅以泽早在一年前就跟沈心柔勾搭在一起，沈心柔靠着傅以泽在娱乐圈如鱼得水，某一天傅以泽见到了路过的姜予漾，对她一见倾心，而姜予漾想方设法取消这门婚事。
translations.target: Actress Jiang Yuyang has long idolized V-God—she even dreams about him. In reality, her fiancé, Fu Yize, whom she has never met, demands that she marry into the Fu family to repay a favor owed between their grandfathers' generation. Yet Fu Yize has been involved with Shen Xinrou for a year, and Shen Xinrou thrives in the entertainment industry by relying on him. One day, Fu Yize catches sight of Jiang Yuyang as she passes by and falls for her at first sight, while Jiang Yuyang tries every possible way to cancel the engagement.
President Shao, Madam Went Live to Join a Matchmaking Stream Again
Female-oriented

translations.source: 邵太太为了引起邵总的注意，再次去直播相亲，两人之间的爱情故事充满趣味和甜蜜。
translations.target: To catch President Shao's attention, Mrs. Shao goes on a live matchmaking stream again. Their love story is full of humor and sweetness.
The Dragon Gate Son-in-Law
Male-oriented

translations.source: 醉卧美人膝醒掌大权，谁人不服
translations.target: Drunk, I rest on a beauty's lap; awake, I wield supreme power—who dares refuse to submit?

translations.source: 《辞职后前总裁对我余情未了》
translations.target: After I Resigned, My Ex-CEO Still Couldn't Let Me Go
Female-oriented

translations.source: 宋襄是严总的私人秘书负责严总的一切，却发现严总只是把她作为工具弃之如履于是她决定离开，严总没想到前总裁竟开始穷追不舍.
translations.target: Song Xiang is President Yan's personal secretary, responsible for everything related to him—only to realize he treats her as a mere tool and discards her without hesitation. She decides to leave, but President Yan never expects that the former CEO will begin pursuing her relentlessly.

translations.source: 顾总的隐婚娇妻是女帝
translations.target: President Gu's Secret Wife Is an Empress
Male-oriented

translations.source: 女帝穿越现代竟穿成霸道总裁的隱婚娇妻？总裁老公要离婚，女帝却把他当男宠
translations.target: An empress transmigrates into modern times—only to become a domineering CEO's secret wife? When her CEO husband wants a divorce, the empress treats him as her male concubine.

translations.source: 救命，魔尊大人把我宠上天
translations.target: Help! The Demon Lord Spoils Me to the Heavens
Female-oriented

translations.source: 网文作家李蕙娇在许愿时意外召唤出了自己书中的大反派赤弦魔尊厉苍云，厉苍云为回到书中决定为李蕙娇实现愿望，帮她追求她暗恋已久的霸总涂梓浩。然而当霸总真的爱上自己时，李蕙娇才发现自己喜欢的人是厉苍云。
translations.target: Online fiction writer Li Huijiao accidentally summons the ultimate villain from her own novel—the Demon Lord of Chixian, Li Cangyun—while making a wish. Determined to return to the book, Li Cangyun decides to grant Li Huijiao's wish and help her pursue Tu Zihao, the domineering CEO she has secretly loved for years. However, when the CEO truly falls in love with her, Li Huijiao realizes that the one she actually loves is Li Cangyun.
Northern Desert Rampage
Male-oriented

translations.source: 天狼卫首领、北漠狼王沈天君凯旋回归后却发现自己父亲被害，沈氏集团被二叔沈人凤联合三大家族夺走，妻子慕筱也被迫要改嫁给程家大少。狼王沈天君一怒之下以一己之力摧枯拉朽瓦解梁、程、欧阳三大家族，击败二叔夺回集团，为父报仇，并与妻子破镜重圆。
translations.target: Shen Tianjun, leader of the Tianlang Guard and the Wolf King of the Northern Desert, returns in triumph only to find his father has been murdered. The Shen Group has been seized by his second uncle Shen Renfeng in collusion with three major families, and his wife Mu Xiao is forced to remarry the Cheng family's eldest young master. Enraged, Shen Tianjun single-handedly crushes the Liang, Cheng, and Ouyang families, defeats his second uncle to reclaim the group, avenges his father, and reconciles with his wife.
President Chi, Your Wife Wants to Divorce You
Female-oriented

translations.source: 结婚三年，他却在她的生日当天约会白月光，她当场提出离婚！他却以为她是欲情故纵的把戏，直到他得知她去酒吧点了男人.
translations.target: Three years into their marriage, he goes on a date with his first love on her birthday. She demands a divorce on the spot! He assumes it's just a push-and-pull game—until he learns she went to a bar and ordered a man.
Seeking Pleasure
Female-oriented

translations.source: 大夏国的长公主吴欢，心狠手辣，把持朝政已久，皇帝早已心生不满，预谋刺杀吴欢，而吴欢为皇帝扫清障碍，一切都是为了皇帝，到头来被亲自送给皇帝的刀所杀，她不甘心就这样死去，她的执念带她穿越到了现代她看到了与自己长得一模一样的吴迪，和端王浩炎长相一样的顾浩炎。吴迪是一个神秘编剧，作为《长公主》的编剧与三金影帝顾浩炎结婚，吴迪以为自己嫁给了爱情放弃了事业，实则婚后是冷漠相待，和无尽的等待，吴迪的忍气吞声，却遭到了顾浩炎背叛了吴迪，季雨婷派人羞辱吴迪，导致了吴迪的死亡。
translations.target: Wu Huan, the eldest princess of Great Xia, is ruthless and has long dominated the court. The emperor grows dissatisfied and plots to assassinate her. Wu Huan clears away obstacles for him—everything she does is for the emperor—only to be killed in the end by the very blade she personally presented to him. Unwilling to die like this, her obsession carries her into the modern world, where she sees Wu Di, who looks exactly like her, and Gu Haoyan, who resembles Prince Haoyan. Wu Di is a mysterious screenwriter who, as the writer of "The Eldest Princess," marries Gu Haoyan, a Three-Golden-Awards Best Actor. Wu Di believes she married for love and gives up her career, but after marriage she is met only with coldness and endless waiting. Though she endures in silence, Gu Haoyan betrays her, and Ji Yuting has people humiliate her, ultimately leading to Wu Di's death.

translations.source: 吴欢的灵魂穿越千年，到了吴迪的身上，获取了吴迪所有的记忆和情感，吴迪和吴欢两个灵魂的交流，双方达成协议，彼此都心怀怨恨，吴迪让吴欢成为她，吴欢势要为伤害过吴迪的人，付出代价。吴迪在这一刻重生了，开启了一系列的报复计划，与顾浩炎进行谈判想要离婚。陆寻凭借《长公主1》，获得了最佳男主角，无意中救下了中了迷药的吴迪，陆寻曾经的恋人，背叛了陆寻选择了顾浩炎，最后嫁给了顾浩炎的大哥(顾浩淼)。陆寻和吴迪联手撕渣男渣女，曾经伤害过他们的人，让他们通通付出代价。
translations.target: Wu Huan's soul travels a thousand years and enters Wu Di's body, inheriting all of Wu Di's memories and emotions. Through communication between the two souls, they reach an agreement. Both harbor resentment: Wu Di allows Wu Huan to become "her," and Wu Huan vows to make those who hurt Wu Di pay the price. At this moment, Wu Di is reborn and launches a series of revenge plans, negotiating with Gu Haoyan for a divorce. Lu Xun wins Best Actor for "The Eldest Princess 1" and, by chance, rescues Wu Di when she has been drugged. Lu Xun's former lover betrayed him for Gu Haoyan and ultimately married Gu Haoyan's older brother, Gu Haomiao. Lu Xun and Wu Di join forces to tear down the scumbag man and woman, making everyone who ever harmed them pay dearly.
Jiangxia Journey: The Golden Partner
Male-oriented

translations.source: 盛子浩盛世集团的继承人，因不学无术被放养到乌龙泉，并要求三个月内带着乌龙泉振兴发展，否则就不能得到盛家资产。在阴差阳错下带领乌龙泉发展的人被错认成了黄旺，于是在黄旺盛子浩和乌龙泉的村民们之间展开了新的故事
translations.target: Sheng Zihao, heir to the Shengshi Group, is sent to Wulongquan after being deemed a good-for-nothing. He is required to revitalize and develop Wulongquan within three months, or he will not receive the Sheng family's assets. Through a series of accidents and misunderstandings, the person leading Wulongquan's development is mistaken for Huang Wang, and a new story unfolds among Huang Wang, Sheng Zihao, and the villagers of Wulongquan.
Dominating Qin
Male-oriented

translations.source: 设计师陈羽一朝穿越至秦朝，没想到落地就被抓去修长城，陈羽叫苦连天之际忽然听闻始皇嬴政病重，能替其治病者有重赏，陈羽揭下皇榜却被赵高的人追杀，幸亏他逃进大皇子扶苏的宫殿才得留一命，觐见始皇，但赵高心怀毒计意欲让陈羽与方士斗法，害死陈羽，却没想到陈羽精通数理化，在打脸方士的同时，还巧妙的将身上的消炎药献了出去……
translations.target: Designer Chen Yu transmigrates to the Qin Dynasty—only to be seized the moment he arrives and forced to build the Great Wall. While he is lamenting his fate, he hears that the First Emperor Ying Zheng is gravely ill and that anyone who can cure him will be richly rewarded. Chen Yu tears down the imperial notice but is hunted by Zhao Gao's men. He survives only by fleeing into the palace of the eldest prince, Fusu. He is granted an audience with the emperor, but Zhao Gao harbors a sinister plot and intends to have Chen Yu duel a Daoist alchemist, hoping to get Chen Yu killed. Unexpectedly, Chen Yu is well-versed in math, physics, and chemistry; as he humiliates the alchemist, he also cleverly presents his anti-inflammatory medicine...
